name: Job
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Job
description:
Job

A resource represents the long-running, asynchronous processing of a speech-recognition operation. The job can be refreshed to retrieve recognition results once the audio data has been processed.

See Project#recognize_job and Audio#recognize_job.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

job = speech.recognize_job "path/to/audio.raw",
                           encoding: :raw, sample_rate: 16000

job.done? #=> false
job.reload! # API call
job.done? #=> true
results = job.results

methods.name: results
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Job#results
methods.description: A speech recognition result corresponding to a portion of the audio.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

job = speech.recognize_job "path/to/audio.raw",
                           encoding: :raw, sample_rate: 16000

job.done? #=> true
results = job.results

returns.description: The transcribed text of audio recognized. If the job is not done this will return nil.

methods.name: done?
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Job#done?
methods.description: Checks if the speech-recognition processing of the audio data is complete.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

job = speech.recognize_job "path/to/audio.raw",
                           encoding: :raw, sample_rate: 16000

job.done? #=> false

methods.name: reload!
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Job#reload!
methods.description: Reloads the job with current data from the long-running, asynchronous processing of a speech-recognition operation.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

job = speech.recognize_job "path/to/audio.raw",
                           encoding: :raw, sample_rate: 16000

job.done? #=> false
job.reload! # API call
job.done? #=> true

methods.name: wait_until_done!
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Job#wait_until_done!
methods.description: Reloads the job until the operation is complete. The delay between reloads will incrementally increase.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

job = speech.recognize_job "path/to/audio.raw",
                           encoding: :raw, sample_rate: 16000

job.done? #=> false
job.wait_until_done!
job.done? #=> true
